channel.title: What happens when you die
channel.description:
What do you guys think?
I'm not religious. IMO, I think when you die you just die. Body rots away back to the earth. I wonder though how does it feel to be nothing? Scary, isn't it...

item.title: What happens when you die
item.dc:creator: @nicodk nicodk
item.description:
@nicodk wrote:

how is it to be dead?
the question of questions…

i hope i wont get reborn or like.
i want to do the stuff ive allways dreamed of and live in “MY” own world.
like, ive allways liked stuff that you should be 18/21 to view… i watch it allmost evry day.
id love to change that :embrased: :roll:

another view of mine is,

jme_009:

I believe that nothing really happens. Kind of like sleeping without any dreams or anything at all happening.

it would be quite probardly be the best way to die for many.
death is an escape from this corrupted world, so many wishes to die.
so much to say, but if i wrote it all i would be called wierdo 4 eternety in here.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @gho5t gho5t
item.description:
@gho5t wrote:

Just a question, even though some people believe in like re-incarnation, dont you think that like cows would find a way to tell us that they were actually re-incarnated into cows?
Like form their poop into the words “I was a human once” Lol.
I have nothing against you if you do believe in re-incarnation, I just think it is a little bit improbable. (It could happen one day though :D)

item.title: What happens when you die
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

[quote=“happy_world, post:47, topic:87363”]the second you will be dieing, wou will see an angel, if you done good in this live you will se an angel which is wearing white and you will put a nice small smile on your face but if you done bad you will see anagel wearning black and you will have an angrey or normal look on your face depond on what you have done. then the angel will take your soul away.
when you die you will be bared in a graveyard. then you will wake up for few minutes (and many people tryied to see how but they couldn’t) then you will be asked few questions (if you want to know wht they are just ask me), after you nswered them your soul will be taken away untill the day of judgement.[/quote]

I presume you are ‘Christian’ and trying to be smart. Lemme clarify a few things:

  1. You are Protestant (or Mormon [heaven’s no!]), and therefore have very twisted information.
  2. If you ARE ‘Christian’ and you sincerely think what you said is what the Holy Fathers taught, then you are truly wrong. It was never taught in the Church that you will die, and the “see an angel”. Actually, no one in the Church knows what happens after you die. It is all speculation.

Anyway, I know what happens after you die: WHO. THE. FUCK. CARES.

Read full topic

nope what life is about just going and coming back
and do you know why wear you born[/quote]

No-one truely knows.

This thread is just random idea’s being thrown around.

item.title: What happens when you die
item.dc:creator: @xXH34DSH0TXx xXH34DSH0TXx
item.description:
@xXH34DSH0TXx wrote:

Aftermath:

You just die, your brain stops working, your heart stops beating, and then you’re just dead. There will be no boredom because there will be no functional brain to comprehend the passage of time.

Precisly what I think. You die, your body decomposes in the ground, that’s all there is to it x.x.
Do you remember what it was like before were born? Of course not , there’s nothing there, and IMO, it’d be the same when you die.

Read full topic

item.title: What happens when you die
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Read what? The bible… stuff that i hate religion.

phonnygoblin:

I have a friend who gets terrible grades, but is super creative. I talked to him about this in one of our classes and he told me that he thinks that when you die you become a new person(like chris said), but all your dreams, daydreams, unfamiliar memories, and déjà vu(s), are the life of your past selves. This is 100% true btw if anyone cares.

What’s 100% true? What he said or the fact that he said it?

Read full topic

item.title: What happens when you die
item.dc:creator: @rspoon rspoon
item.description:
@rspoon wrote:

Im a catholic, and as little as I want to get into religion…=:

I believe that when you die, your soul will float upwards to heaven. Yes, everyone, towards heaven. Not everyone will go to heaven though. Theres a “gulf” and on one side of the gulf is everyone who made it to heaven. The other side, is the people who did not. They will wait there to be judged. If they do not win the “appeal” they will be sentenced to hell.

Now, I dont want anyone thinking im crazy and gods going to walk out onto the stand to lawyer music. When I say “get judged”, I mean God will decide what their punishment will be.

So, all in all, everything could be wrong, and everything might happen like in a different religion. Possibly, no one will be right. No one knows yet. But there ‘might’ come a day everyone will know.

I just know that Ive had miracles happen to me. And the bible was written so long ago. How could they have predicted the outcome of our future?

EDIT: Btw, just because Im catholic, does NOT mean I believe everything I say. What I get from the bible is closest to their teachings.

Read full topic

item.title: What happens when you die
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

I’m Wiccan. It’s a neo-pagan religion with duality. I believe when you die, you go to Summerland to await a new body for your soul to take. In each life your soul learns new lessons, and the rule of three (known as karma) takes effect. Bad things that happen to good people, their past lives were dicks, and vice-versa. Then, when your soul has been self taught everything, you die and live with the God and Goddess. Summerland is a wonderful place. Everyone goes there, no matter what you believe in. It’s not like heaven, you can do what ever you want, and make it what ever you want.

Read full topic

item.title: What happens when you die
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I believe, that, me being a christian, a Methodist, that. When you die, if you take God as your saviour, and that has died for your sins, that you will go to heaven, to be one of his disciples. And if you are not a believer, or you don’t repent, and you’re blasphemous, then you will suffer in the torments of Hell for all eternity. But, that’s just me, and that’s in a nutshell, I wrote a 15 pg. persuasive paper to my English Teacher on why it is so important to repent. And don’t smash me about this, I just believe that you go to heaven if you meet the criteria, how you literally get to heaven, I don’t know.

Read full topic
